unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Bollywood Braces for a Biryani Buffet of Releases!**
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Bollywood Braces for a Biryani Buffet of Releases!

unnormalised: Mumbai - Bollywood is gearing up for a release schedule so packed, it's practically bursting at the seams like a poorly-stitched lehenga! Experts are calling it the "Clash of the Titans, Part 2" after that whole Diwali fiasco of 'XYZ vs ABC' that ended with everyone just re-watching 'Andaz Apna Apna' anyway.
normalised: Mumbai - Bollywood is gearing up for a release schedule so packed, it is practically bursting at the seams like a poorly-stitched lehenga! Experts are calling it the "Clash of the Titans, Part Two" after that whole Diwali fiasco of 'X Y Z versus A B C' that ended with everyone just re-watching 'Andaz Apna Apna' anyway.

unnormalised: This week alone sees the release of 3 major films. First, there's "Agent Vinod Returns (Again!)", apparently Vinod was just stuck in traffic near Andheri, that's why the long gap. Then we have "Sharma Ji Ka Sasural 2: Electric Boogaloo", a comedy promising more awkward situations than a family gathering during Onam.
normalised: This week alone sees the release of three major films. First, there is "Agent Vinod Returns (Again!)", apparently Vinod was just stuck in traffic near Andheri, that is why the long gap. Then we have "Sharma Ji Ka Sasural Two: Electric Boogaloo", a comedy promising more awkward situations than a family gathering during Onam.

unnormalised: But the biggest buzz surrounds "Dangal Returns… to Space!", starring Aamir Khan as a retired wrestler training aliens for intergalactic kabaddi. Early reviews are…mixed. Some critics say it's a cinematic masterpiece, others claim it's like eating biryani with ketchup. Either way, grab your popcorn and brace yourselves, Bollywood's about to deliver a spicy dish of entertainment! Initial estimates peg opening day collections at anywhere between Rs. 50 cr and complete box office doom. Good luck, filmmakers!
